model.entity

Class EntitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.entity.EntitySystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntitySystem, ISerializable, java.io.Serializable

    public class EntitySystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEntitySystem
    Implementation of an entity system. This implementation is focused on the IDs. It spawns entities based on the next available ID and adds them to the system.
    Author:
    Rhondu Smithwick
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
